name: joli-event-gamification
description: Event Gamification Platform with Client and Organizer apps

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:user-api" "npm run dev:organizer-api" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:organizer"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:user-api" "npm run dev:organizer-api"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:client && npm run build:organizer
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:user-api && npm run build:organizer-api && npm run build:shared
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server-shared && npm install && cd ../server-user && npm install && cd ../server-organizer && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../organizer && npm install
scripts.start:production: concurrently "npm run start:shared" "npm run start:user-api" "npm run start:organizer-api"

author: Joli Team
